title: Cold Caller/Appointment Setter
job_overview:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
* Calling prospective leads or potential clients and discuss/negotiate matters to them.
* Scheduling appointments. 
* Nurture leads.
* Maintain accuracy of records in CRM/Tracker/Database.
* Email and calendar management.
* Admin & Ad hoc tasks.
(further discussion will be done during the interview)


QUALIFICATIONS:
* Good communication and listening skills.
* Proven experience in Cold Calling/Appointment Setting.
* Proficient in using CRMs and Dialers.
* Tech-savvy and can handle various tools/software.
* Reliable & has good work ethics.


HOW TO APPLY:
Don't send a message. Please fill out the form below.
(Copy-paste the link on your browser and remove the spaces)
